resources.string: I strongly recommend you read the help page before using this app. It has useful tips, instructions, and warnings. Click help to go there now.
1) Click the New File button on the Main Screen
2) Enter a name for the file and click "Create"
2) Click the Enter button or click Done on the soft keyboard and the text will be saved
1) Just select a file to read from the list on the Home Screen
1) Click the Delete button or hit menu to bring up the Delete button
2) Then click Delete on the Confirm Dialog Box, dummy

EDB\'s file encryption is unique to any system you\'ve seen in the past. Each file has a unique method for encryption. The files stored on your phone are encrypted themselves, so even if one does find them, your secrets are safe.
Passwords are optional, because you should set a lockscreen pattern or password. However, should you want one, simply go to this app\'s Settings
This encryption method is NOT guarenteed. Use at your own risk. Also THERE IS NO WAY TO EDIT A LINE AFTER IT IS ENTERED! We may fix this in future versions, but as of now it is impossible.
Click here to set a super cool password!
